blocks.name: lmimlbs
blocks.content: The isomorphic image of a basis is a basis. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmimlbs(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), wcel(cima(c0, c3), c5))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(clbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(clbs, c2))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), wcel(cima(c0, c3), c5), wcel(cima(c0, c3), cfv(clinds, c2)), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c2), cima(c0, c3)), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  syl2an3an(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(cima(c0, c3), cfv(clinds, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wf1(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(clinds, c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wf1(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)), wf1o(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  f1of1(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))
  sseli(c3, c4, cfv(clinds, c1))
  lbslinds(c4, c1)
  lindsmm2(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2), c3)
  3eqtr3d(cfv(cfv(clspn, c2), cima(c0, c3)), cfv(cbs, c2), cima(c0, cfv(cfv(clspn, c1), c3)), cima(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)))
  imaeq2d(c0, cfv(cfv(clspn, c1), c3), cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wceq(cfv(cfv(clspn, c1), c3), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  lbssp(c3, c4, cfv(clspn, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), c1)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wceq(cima(c0, cfv(cfv(clspn, c1), c3)), cfv(cfv(clspn, c2), cima(c0, c3))), wcel(c0, co(c1, clmhm, c2)), wss(c3, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  lmimlmhm(c0, c1, c2)
  lbsss(c3, c4, cfv(cbs, c1), c1)
  lmhmlsp(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(clspn, c1), cfv(clspn, c2))
  eqid(cfv(clspn, c1))
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(cima(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), cfv(cbs, c2)), wf1o(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)), wfo(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, clmim, c2)), wcel(c3, c4), wf1o(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  lmimf1o(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  f1ofo(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))
  foima(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))
  islbs4(cima(c0, c3), c5, c2, cfv(clspn, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))
  eqid(cfv(clspn, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lmimlbs(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(c1[LMIso]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4)→(c0 " c3)∈ c5)
  ⊣ c4 =(LBasis ` c1)
  ⊣ c5 =(LBasis ` c2)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈(c1[LMIso]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4), (c0 " c3)∈ c5, (c0 " c3)∈(LIndS ` c2), ((LSpan ` c2)`(c0 " c3))=(Base ` c2))
  syl2an3an(c0 ∈(c1[LMIso]c2), c3 ∈ c4, (c0 " c3)∈(LIndS ` c2), c0 ∈(c1[LMHom]c2), (c0 :(Base ` c1)↣(Base ` c2)), c3 ∈(LIndS ` c1))
  syl(c0 ∈(c1[LMIso]c2), (c0 :(Base ` c1)↣(Base ` c2)), (c0 :(Base ` c1)↔(Base ` c2)))
  f1of1(c0, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c2))
  sseli(c3, c4, (LIndS ` c1))
  lbslinds(c4, c1)
  lindsmm2(c0, c1, c2, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c2), c3)
  3eqtr3d(((LSpan ` c2)`(c0 " c3)), (Base ` c2), (c0 "((LSpan ` c1)` c3)), (c0 "(Base ` c1)), (c0 ∈(c1[LMIso]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4))
  imaeq2d(c0, ((LSpan ` c1)` c3), (Base ` c1), (c0 ∈(c1[LMIso]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4))
  adantl(c0 ∈(c1[LMIso]c2), c3 ∈ c4, ((LSpan ` c1)` c3)=(Base ` c1))
  lbssp(c3, c4, (LSpan ` c1), (Base ` c1), c1)
  syl2an(c0 ∈(c1[LMIso]c2), c3 ∈ c4, (c0 "((LSpan ` c1)` c3))=((LSpan ` c2)`(c0 " c3)), c0 ∈(c1[LMHom]c2), c3 ⊆(Base ` c1))
  lmimlmhm(c0, c1, c2)
  lbsss(c3, c4, (Base ` c1), c1)
  lmhmlsp(c0, c1, c2, c3, (Base ` c1), (LSpan ` c1), (LSpan ` c2))
  eqid((LSpan ` c1))
  3syl((c0 ∈(c1[LMIso]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4), (c0 "(Base ` c1))=(Base ` c2), (c0 :(Base ` c1)↔(Base ` c2)), (c0 :(Base ` c1)↠(Base ` c2)))
  adantr(c0 ∈(c1[LMIso]c2), c3 ∈ c4, (c0 :(Base ` c1)↔(Base ` c2)))
  lmimf1o(c0, c1, c2, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  f1ofo(c0, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c2))
  foima(c0, (Base ` c1), (Base ` c2))
  islbs4((c0 " c3), c5, c2, (LSpan ` c2), (Base ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  eqid((LSpan ` c2))
}

blocks.name: lmiclbs
blocks.content: Having a basis is an isomorphism invariant. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmiclbs(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, clmic, c1), wi(wne(c2, emptycls), wne(c3, emptycls)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(clbs, c1))
} = {
  sylbi(wbr(c0, clmic, c1), wi(wne(c2, emptycls), wne(c3, emptycls)), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, clmim, c1))))
  bitri(wbr(c0, clmic, c1), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, clmim, c1))), wne(co(c0, clmim, c1), emptycls))
  brlmic(c0, c1)
  n0(hs0, co(c0, clmim, c1))
  exlimiv(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, clmim, c1)), wi(wne(c2, emptycls), wne(c3, emptycls)))
  syl5bi(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, clmim, c1)), wne(c2, emptycls), wne(c3, emptycls), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  n0(hs1, c2)
  exlimdv(hs1, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, clmim, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wne(c3, emptycls))
  ex(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, clmim, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wne(c3, emptycls))
  ne0d(c3, cima(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, clmim, c1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  lmimlbs(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cv(hs1), c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, clmim, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wne(c2, emptycls), wne(c3, emptycls)))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, clmim, c1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wne(c3, emptycls))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lmiclbs(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0[~=m]c1 →(c2 ≠ ∅ → c3 ≠ ∅))
  ⊣ c2 =(LBasis ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(LBasis ` c1)
} = {
  sylbi(c0[~ = m]c1, (c2 ≠ ∅ → c3 ≠ ∅), ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1)))
  bitri(c0[~ = m]c1, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1)), (c0[LMIso]c1)≠ ∅)
  brlmic(c0, c1)
  n0(hs0, (c0[LMIso]c1))
  exlimiv(hs0, hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1), (c2 ≠ ∅ → c3 ≠ ∅))
  syl5bi(hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1), c2 ≠ ∅, c3 ≠ ∅, ∃(hs1, hs1 ∈ c2))
  n0(hs1, c2)
  exlimdv(hs1, hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1), hs1 ∈ c2, c3 ≠ ∅)
  ex(hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1), hs1 ∈ c2, c3 ≠ ∅)
  ne0d(c3, (hs0 " hs1), (hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1)∧ hs1 ∈ c2))
  lmimlbs(hs0, c0, c1, hs1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[LMIso]c1))
  diff.hs0.w((c2 ≠ ∅ → c3 ≠ ∅))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ∈(c0[LMIso]c1))
  diff.hs1.w(c3 ≠ ∅)
}

blocks.name: islindf4

blocks.name: lmisfree
blocks.content: A module has a basis iff it is isomorphic to a free module. In settings where isomorphic objects are not distinguished, it is common to define "free module" as any module with a basis; thus for instance ~ lbsex might be described as "every vector space is free". (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm lmisfree(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wb(wne(c1, emptycls), wex(s0, wbr(c0, clmic, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(clbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  impbid1(wcel(c0, clmod), wne(c1, emptycls), wex(s0, wbr(c0, clmic, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0)))))
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, clmod), wne(c1, emptycls), wex(s0, wbr(c0, clmic, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0)))), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  n0(hs0, c1)
  exlimdv(hs0, wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wex(s0, wbr(c0, clmic, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0)))))
  ex(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wex(s0, wbr(c0, clmic, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wex(s0, wbr(c0, clmic, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0)))), wbr(c0, clmic, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(hs0))))
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(c0, clmic, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, cv(hs0)))
  enref(cv(hs0))
  lbslcic(c0, cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs0), c2)
  spcev(s0, cv(hs0), wbr(c0, clmic, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(hs0))), wbr(c0, clmic, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0))))
  vex(hs0)
  breq2d(c0, clmic, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0)), co(c2, cfrlm, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))

  lmicsym(c0, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0)))
  syl(wbr(c0, clmic, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0))), wne(cfv(clbs, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0))), emptycls), wcel(c0, clmod))
  lmiclcl(c0, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0)))
  ne0d(cfv(clbs, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0))), crn(co(c2, cuvc, cv(s0))), wcel(c0, clmod))
  sylancl(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(crn(co(c2, cuvc, cv(s0))), cfv(clbs, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(cv(s0), universe))

  eqid(co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0)))
  eqid(co(c2, cuvc, cv(s0)))
  lmiclbs(co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0)), c0, cfv(clbs, co(c2, cfrlm, cv(s0))), c1)

blocks.content: Every vector space is isomorphic to a free module. (Contributed by AV, 7-Mar-2019.)

blocks.name: uvcf1o
blocks.content: In a nonzero ring, the mapping of the index set of a free module onto the unit vectors of the free module is a 1-1 onto function. (Contributed by AV, 10-Mar-2019.)

blocks.name: uvcendim
blocks.content: In a nonzero ring, the number of unit vectors of a free module corresponds to the dimension of the free module. (Contributed by AV, 10-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:

  syl7(wa(wcel(c0, cnzr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wcel(c0, cnzr), wcel(c1, c2)), wf1o(cv(hs0), c1, crn(c3)), wf1o(c3, c1, crn(c3)))
  uvcf1o(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cnzr), wcel(c1, c2)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wi(wf1o(c3, c1, crn(c3)), wf1o(cv(hs0), c1, crn(c3)))))
  biimpd(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wf1o(c3, c1, crn(c3)), wf1o(cv(hs0), c1, crn(c3)))
  eqcoms(cv(hs0), c3, wb(wf1o(c3, c1, crn(c3)), wf1o(cv(hs0), c1, crn(c3))))

blocks.name: frlmisfrlm
blocks.content: A free module is isomorphic to a free module over the same (nonzero) ring, with the same cardinality. (Contributed by AV, 10-Mar-2019.)

  sylan(wcel(c0, cnzr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(crn(co(c0, cuvc, c1)), cfv(clbs, co(c0, cfrlm, c1))), wcel(c0, crg))

  3adant3(wcel(c0, cnzr), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c1, cen, c3), wbr(c1, cen, crn(co(c0, cuvc, c1))))

blocks.name: frlmiscvec
blocks.content: Every free module is isomorphic to the free module of "column vectors" of the same dimension over the same (nonzero) ring. (Contributed by AV, 10-Mar-2019.)
